Commands.Target: return ["We're so happy to see that your time in our community has resulted in such a high rating! return ["We truly regret to hear that you're unhappy with your experience in our community. We strive to provide residents with a great place to call home, and we'd love the opportunity to address any concerns you may have. Please call or stop by the leasing office at your earliest convenience so we can discuss your feedback further. Thank you!","Thank you for sharing your thoughts about our community. We always appreciate feedback, as it gives us a chance to improve your experience here. We encourage you to come by and speak with us in the office at your earliest convenience to answer any questions or concerns you may have. We look forward to speaking with you soon and thank you for your feedback.","Our aim is to ensure that all of our residents feel welcome and come away with a positive experience here at our community. Please do not hesitate to reach out to our office if there are any issues you would like for us to address. Our team would greatly appreciate the opportunity to work with you to better the experience here at our community. Thank you for your review.","We're incredibly disappointed to see that your experience at our community has not been positive. Please call or stop by the front office at your earliest convenience, we would love the opportunity to go over your concerns in person and improve your stay with us. Thank you!","We're so sorry to see your experience in our community has been less than positive. We'd love to know more about what inspired your rating so that we can continue to improve our community, please contact us whenever is convenient for you so that we may address your concerns.","Thank you for taking the time to review our community. We're always looking for ways to improve your experience here, and we're sorry if we've missed the mark with you. We'd love to hear more from you. If you have any concerns or questions that need to be addressed, please donâ€™t hesitate to drop by our office for a chat.","We are so sorry to see that you have not enjoyed your time at our community as much as we would like you to. We would like to help better your stay, if you have any concerns or suggestions on how we can improve your experience with us please call or stop by the office and we can talk through them together. Thank you for this opportunity to connect."];
